plot: Though April is back with husband Angus Mark still pursues her, taking drugs with her but unwittingly attracts Angus as a friend. In order to impress Joe that he is a life style coach Jeremy rents expensive office space but regrets it when he sees the interest he must pay Mark for the loan and colludes with Super Hans to rob Mark's bank. When the robber backs out however Mark rather wishes he hadn't.—don @ minifie-1
